page.title: 11The Tea Time Club
page.content: The Tea Time Club is on a Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. It starts at 3.3O and finishes at 5.OO. On a Monday, Tuesday and Thursday we play games like tennis and twister. The girls knit or play in the Wendy house. The boys play football outside. There is a shop where we can buy sweets and crisps. On a Wednesday a Disco is on. At the Disco we dance. We can choose our favourite records. There is a competition. We stand at the back and tell the lady what the song is. We also have a competition for the best dancer. The Tea Time Club is held in Choppington Community Centre.
